title: The Skip Bayless Show - Skip's Most Memorable Undisputed Guests & Moments
description:
Hey Undisputed fans! With Skip & Shannon off the air this week we wanted to share this special Q&A episode of the Skip Bayless Show, where Skip goes over his favorite moments and guests from Undisputed. Click here to follow The Skip Bayless Show: https://listen.foxaud.io/SkipBaylessShow?sid=unx
To ask Skip a question for a future Q&A episode, tweet @SkipBaylessShow on Twitter, or leave your question with a 5-star review on Apple Podcasts.
00:00 What is the one thing you cannot leave the home without each day?
4:04 Is there a particular episode of Undisputed that you remember for one reason or another?
10:16 On the last game of the season, would you rather see the Cowboys knock Washington, Philly or the Giants out of the playoffs?
Follow the Skip Bayless Show on all platforms:
https://twitter.com/skipbaylessshow
https://www.facebook.com/SkipBaylessShow/
https://www.instagram.com/skipbaylessshow/
https://www.tiktok.com/@skipbaylessshow
https://www.youtube.com/c/skipbaylessshow
Listen to & follow more FOX Sports podcasts: http://sprtspod.fox/b7si4wkv
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Hey Undisputed fans! With Skip & Shannon off the air this week we wanted to share this special Q&A episode of the Skip Bayless Show, where Skip goes over his favorite moments and guests from Undisputed. Click here to follow The Skip Bayless Show: https://listen.foxaud.io/SkipBaylessShow?sid=unx

To ask Skip a question for a future Q&A episode, tweet @SkipBaylessShow on Twitter, or leave your question with a 5-star review on Apple Podcasts.

00:00 What is the one thing you cannot leave the home without each day?

4:04 Is there a particular episode of Undisputed that you remember for one reason or another?

10:16 On the last game of the season, would you rather see the Cowboys knock Washington, Philly or the Giants out of the playoffs?
